Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Sen. Kamala Harris introduced a bill to forbid police officers from drawing their guns without permission from their supervisor, when in fact no such bill exists.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or documentation provided to verify the existence of the bill.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Sen. Kamala Harris would introduce a bill that restricts police officers from using their firearms without permission, without any basis or evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no such bill was introduced by Sen. Kamala Harris, as confirmed by fact-checkers and the official website of Congress.
Falters at times: The claim falters by spreading false information and misinformation, despite being debunked by fact-checkers.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim originated from a satire website called Blue News Network and was not meant to be taken seriously.
